main.heroText: Take immediate action with it before a fire breaks out
main.usageText: With its rough surface facing the direction of possible fire risk, the protector of the adhesive tape on the back is removed and adhered parallel to the ground. In vehicles, it is glued to the bodywork, over the battery caps and fuel filter. In electrical panels and electrical clocks, it is adhered to the ceiling on the inner surface of the panel. Separate stickers should be placed on each independent section.

specs.text1:
The MicroFireX is a compact, palm-sized, high-performance, Pyrotechnic Fire Fighting Device (Automatic fire extinguishing system) with a durable metal casing designed for both professional and home users.

The device has been tested and certified accordance with the EU Directive 2013/29/EU on Pyrotechnic Articles.
specs.text2:
It is compact in size (**66 x 27 x 20 mm**) and weighs **50 ± 1 grams**.

The effective extinguishing volume is **0.3 m³ (300 liters)**. One sticker can extinguish a fire inside a cabinet of approximately **60 x 60 x 85 cm** in size.
Design Density of MicroFirex is 60g/m³.
The device is designed to be used in enclosed spaces, such as electrical panels, vehicles, and other areas where fire risk is present.

card1.title: Automatic Activation
card1.content: Automatically activates at 170°C, no electrical connection required

card2.title: Rapid Response
card2.content: Extinguishes fire in ≤ 5 seconds in volumes of (**0.3 m³ (300 liters)**), nano-sized aerosol technology.

card3.title: Environmentally Friendly
card3.content: MicroFireX does not harm the environment or equipment.
